MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Pentre Uchaf. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at  6:29PM. Our engineers are on their way to the site to investigate this fault on our electrical network and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:30PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:42PM on Sunday 6th December 2020
